name: Academic
desc: Academic entities are centered around study and the pursuit of knowledge.

name: Hobgoblin
desc: Hobgoblins are a sturdy, clever people with a propensity for militaristic order.

name: Leshy
desc: Leshies are living plants animated by primal magic.

name: Lizardfolk
desc: These reptilian humanoids, also known as iruxi, are extremely adaptable and patient.
